description:
Inventor® 3D CAD software provides professional-grade mechanical design, documentation, and product simulation tools.

#### Included as part of the Inventor installation:
Inventor Professional 2024: Try Inventor free for 30 days
Inventor Read-only Mode: Allows you to access Inventor part (.ipt), assembly (.iam), drawing (.idw, dwg), and presentation (.ipn) files for viewing in the Inventor user interface without consuming a license.
DWG TrueView 2024: View and convert 2D and 3D DWG files for free

#### System requirements:
Operating System: 64-bit Microsoft® Windows® 11 and Windows 10.
author: Autodesk
